mapper.select: select su.real_name,tc.create_date,tc.type_name,tc.is_show,tc.type_id from types_content tc left join sys_user su on tc.create_by=su.user_id COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci
select * from sys_order so,types_content tc where so.type_id=tc.type_id and create_by=#{userId} order by create_date desc

select project_name,type_name,subject,is_new,contact_person,real_name,so.order_id,so.create_date,so.is_finish,so.phone from sys_order so left join types_content tc on so.type_id = tc.type_id
left join sys_user su on so.execute_by = su.user_id COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci
is_delete = 0
and project_name like "%"#{projectName}"%"
and execute_by like "%"#{executeBy}"%"
order by so.create_date desc
mapper.update: update sys_order set project_name=#{projectName}, type_id=#{typeId}, contact_person=#{contactPerson}, phone=#{phone}, subject=#{subject}, address=#{address}, execute_by=#{executeBy}, comment=#{comment} where order_id=#{orderId}
mapper.select: select project_name,tc.type_name,tc.type_id,subject,contact_person,su.real_name,su.user_id,so.order_id,so.create_date,so.phone,so.address,so.comment from sys_order so left join types_content tc on so.type_id = tc.type_id left join sys_user su on so.execute_by = su.user_id COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci where so.order_id=#{orderId}
mapper.delete: update sys_order set is_delete=1 where order_id=#{orderId}
mapper.select: select so.project_name,sop.create_date,sop.title,sop.comment,su.real_name from sys_order_progress sop left join sys_user su on sop.create_by=su.user_id COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci left join sys_order so on sop.order_id=so.Order_id COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci where sop.order_id=#{orderId}
